task.title: Grade Calculator using Switch Statement
task.problemStatement: Write a function that takes a score (0-100) and returns a grade letter (A, B, C, D, F) using switch-case statement. A: 90-100, B: 80-89, C: 70-79, D: 60-69, F: 0-59

challenges.title: Day of Week Converter
challenges.description: Convert number (1-7) to day name (Monday-Sunday) using switch-case

challenges.title: Traffic Light Action
challenges.description: Return the appropriate action for traffic light colors (Red: Stop, Yellow: Wait, Green: Go) using switch

challenges.title: Calculator with Switch
challenges.description: Create a calculator function that takes two numbers and an operator (+, -, *, /) using switch-case

task.title: Print Multiplication Table
task.problemStatement: Write a function using for loop to print multiplication table for a given number up to 10. For example, print 5 × 1 = 5, 5 × 2 = 10, ... 5 × 10 = 50

challenges.title: Sum of Numbers
challenges.description: Calculate the sum of numbers from 1 to n using a for loop

challenges.title: Factorial Calculator
challenges.description: Calculate factorial of a number using for loop (5! = 5×4×3×2×1 = 120)

challenges.title: Nested Loop Pattern
challenges.description: Print a pyramid pattern using nested for loops (e.g., * to ***** for 5 rows)

task.title: Count Down Timer
task.problemStatement: Write a function using while loop that counts down from a given number n to 1 and returns all numbers as a string separated by commas

challenges.title: Input Validation Loop
challenges.description: Keep asking for input until user enters a valid number between 1 and 100 using while loop

challenges.title: Sum Until Threshold
challenges.description: Add numbers starting from 1 until the sum exceeds a threshold value using while loop

challenges.title: String Reversal
challenges.description: Reverse a string by removing characters from the end one by one using while loop

task.title: Menu Selection Handler
task.problemStatement: Create a menu system that displays options and executes at least once using do-while loop. The loop should continue until user selects 'Exit'
task.expectedOutput: Menu shown at least once, repeats based on selection until exit option chosen

challenges.title: Password Validation
challenges.description: Keep prompting for password until correct password is entered using do-while loop

challenges.title: Dice Roll Game
challenges.description: Roll a dice (random 1-6) and keep rolling until you get 6 using do-while loop

challenges.title: Number Guessing Game
challenges.description: Implement a guessing game that plays at least once and continues until correct number is guessed

task.title: Object Property Printer
task.problemStatement: Write a function that uses for..in loop to iterate through all properties of an object and return a string with property names and values formatted as 'key: value'

challenges.title: Sum Object Values
challenges.description: Sum all numeric values in an object using for..in loop

challenges.title: Filter Object Properties
challenges.description: Create a new object containing only properties with values greater than a threshold using for..in

challenges.title: Nested Object Iterator
challenges.description: Iterate through nested objects using for..in and collect all leaf values

task.title: Array Element Processor
task.problemStatement: Write a function using for..of loop to iterate through an array of numbers and return the sum of all elements

challenges.title: String Character Counter
challenges.description: Count specific character occurrences in a string using for..of loop

challenges.title: Array Transformation
challenges.description: Transform each element in an array (e.g., square each number) and return new array using for..of

challenges.title: Find Maximum Value
challenges.description: Find the maximum value in an array of numbers using for..of loop

task.title: Debug Infinite Loop
task.problemStatement: Identify and fix infinite loops by ensuring loop counter is updated and exit condition is properly defined. Implement a corrected version of common infinite loop patterns
task.expectedOutput: Fixed loop terminates correctly with proper output after iterations

challenges.title: Missing Increment Fix
challenges.description: Fix a for loop where counter is not incremented, causing infinite loop

challenges.title: Wrong Condition Fix
challenges.description: Fix a while loop with incorrect exit condition that creates infinite loop

challenges.title: Break Statement Implementation
challenges.description: Add proper break statements to exit infinite loops in various scenarios

task.title: Create User Object
task.problemStatement: Create a user object with properties (name, email, age) and methods (getInfo() returns formatted string, updateAge() updates the age). Demonstrate basic OOP principles

challenges.title: Rectangle Class
challenges.description: Create a Rectangle object with width, height properties and methods for area and perimeter calculation

challenges.title: Bank Account Object
challenges.description: Create a BankAccount object with balance, deposit() and withdraw() methods with validation

challenges.title: Student Grade Calculator
challenges.description: Create a Student object that calculates average grade and returns grade letter using methods

task.title: Create Person Factory
task.problemStatement: Write a factory function that creates person objects with properties (name, age) and methods (greet() returns greeting). Call it multiple times to create different person instances
task.expectedOutput: person1.greet() → 'Hello, I am John', person2.greet() → 'Hello, I am Sarah'

challenges.title: Car Factory Function
challenges.description: Create a factory function that produces car objects with brand, model, year and methods

challenges.title: Todo Factory with Methods
challenges.description: Create a factory function that produces todo items with title, completed status and toggle method

challenges.title: Product Factory with Pricing
challenges.description: Create a factory function for products with methods to calculate discount and final price

task.title: Create Person Constructor
task.problemStatement: Write a constructor function Person that takes name and age as parameters. Add a method introduce() using prototype. Create instances with 'new' keyword
task.expectedOutput: new Person('John', 25).introduce() → 'I am John and 25 years old'

challenges.title: Animal Constructor
challenges.description: Create an Animal constructor with species and sound properties, add a method to make sound

challenges.title: Circle Constructor with Area
challenges.description: Create a Circle constructor with radius property and methods to calculate area and circumference

challenges.title: Book Constructor with Prototype
challenges.description: Create a Book constructor and add multiple methods via prototype for getting info and updating details

task.title: Add Properties Dynamically
task.problemStatement: Create an object and dynamically add/remove properties and methods at runtime. Demonstrate bracket notation and adding methods after object creation
task.expectedOutput: obj.newProperty = 'value' works, obj['key'] = 'data' works, methods added dynamically execute correctly

challenges.title: Configuration Builder
challenges.description: Build a configuration object by dynamically adding properties based on conditions

challenges.title: Dynamic Method Binding
challenges.description: Create functions dynamically and attach them as object methods at runtime

challenges.title: Object Property Cloner
challenges.description: Copy properties from one object to another dynamically, including methods

task.title: Verify Constructor Property
task.problemStatement: Create objects using constructor functions and verify the constructor property using obj.constructor. Demonstrate how constructor property references the original constructor function

challenges.title: Type Checker Function
challenges.description: Write a function that identifies the constructor type of any given object

challenges.title: Object Cloning
challenges.description: Clone an object using its constructor property to create a new instance of the same type

challenges.title: Constructor Property Restoration
challenges.description: Create objects where constructor property is lost and restore it correctly
